key_insights: 43 police forces in England and Wales use Single Online Home (SOH) platform via Police.UK
49 fire and rescue services across UK
10 NHS ambulance trusts in England, plus 1 each for Wales, Scotland, Northern Ireland
999 and 112 are primary emergency numbers for all services
